original_title: A L L U V I A L
overview: Synopsis: Alluvial describes the movement of loose sediment that becomes mobile as it is saturated with water. Alluvium is the sediment that water carries and deposits in any non-marine setting. Getting into the alluvial swirl emphasizes how fresh waters and riparian systems are in abolitionist praxis: always dismantling as they build.
title: A L L U V I A L
